Craft an item of type: red_sandstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "gold_nugget", "quantity": 34, "index": 43}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 17, "index": 44}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a red_sandstone_slab I need to place either red_sandstone or chiseled_red_sandstone blocks in the top row of the crafting grid. I have 1 red_sandstone and 2 chiseled_red_sandstones available, so I will use the chiseled_red_sandstone.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
